name: Scuttlebug Derby
description:
Ever wondered what bugs do to pass the time? Delve deep into the most popular sports event in bug society - the Scuttlebug Derby!

Battle it out on the track, using abilities and friends to outrun the competition and make it to 1st place

Keyboard and Gamepad supported - press any button on the menu screen to start local multiplayer (2 player split-screen)

Created for the GitHub GameOff 2021

Controls

Steer - AD/Arrow keys - Left stick/D-pad

Accelerate - W/Up arrow - Right Trigger

Reverse - S/Down arrow - Left Trigger

Item - Space - A Button (xbox)

Reverse Camera - Shift - Left Bumper

Full controls can be found in game - select "More" from the character selection screen

Known Issues

There are occasional issues with bluetooth gamepads due to Steam interference - if you experience this then plugging your controller in should solve the issue.
